thread.title: InfoTrends Matt Swain to Present New Research and Moderate Session at Money20/20
thread.title_full: InfoTrends Matt Swain to Present New Research and Moderate Session at Money20/20 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InfoTrends Matt Swain to Present New Research and Moderate Session at Money20/20
text:
InfoTrends Director Matt Swain will be presenting and moderating at this year’s Money20/20 event, which will take place October 25-28, 2015 at The Palazzo and Sands Convention Center at The Venetian Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas.
Weymouth, MA
InfoTrends Director Matt Swain will be presenting and moderating at this year’s Money20/20 event, which will take place October 25-28, 2015 at The Palazzo and Sands Convention Center at The Venetian Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas.
In his session, entitled “Exploring the Future of Household Bill Payments,” Mr. Swain will be unveiling new consumer research findings before transitioning to moderating an executive panel that includes:
Al Ko, SVP & GM Consumer Ecosystem Group (Mint & Mint Bills) of Intuit John Ballantyne, VP, Digital Money Movement of SunTrust Bank Eric Leiserson, Director, Market Insights & Research of Fiserv Rene Villa, Manager, Electronic Billing & Payments of Florida Power & Light
Mr. Swain’s coverage of the Transactional Communications & Payments market makes him a natural fit for the role of presenter and moderator at Money20/20. “We’re thrilled to have Matt back to present and moderate for us again this year,” noted Andrew Morris, Senior Vice President and Head of Content for Money20/20. “Covering the household bill payment market is important to our content strategy and it is exciting to see that InfoTrends is bringing our attendees new research findings and a panel of experts from across the payments industry.”
“This is going to be a great session,” exclaimed Mr. Swain. “Our research shows that paying bills is second only to cleaning bathrooms as the most loathed household task. We have tested consumer interest in various future bill pay scenarios and I look forward to sharing these insights, as well as discussing the future of household bill payments with our panelists.”
For more information please click here: http://www.money2020.com/
(Enter the registration promo code infot250 and save $250!)
About Money20/20
As the industry’s primetime conference and trade show, Money20/20 delivers the biggest scale, best audience and most engaging event. Money20/20 is the largest global event focused on payments and financial services innovation for connected commerce at the intersection of mobile, retail, marketing services, data and technology. With 10,000+ attendees, including more than 1,000+ CEOs, from 3,000+ companies and 75 countries, expected at our 2015 U.S. event, Money20/20 is critical to realizing the vision of disruptive ways in which consumers and businesses manage, spend and borrow money.
About InfoTrends
InfoTrends is the leading worldwide market research and strategic consulting firm for the imaging, document solutions, production print, and digital media industries. We provide insights and advice to help clients understand market trends, identify opportunities, and grow their business. Additional information about InfoTrends is available on the Web at http://www.infotrends.com .
For media inquiries contact Donna O'Malley at +1 781 616 2116 or donna(dot)omalley(at)infotrends(dot)com.
